Class dom.session.DirectViewAccessFacet 

java.lang.Object
    |
    +----dom.session.BaseFacet
            |
            +----dom.session.DirectViewAccessFacet
public class DirectViewAccessFacet
extends BaseFacet
A facet class that allows direct access to the underlying View instance. Use this class with care, as it exposes all the publicly available methods on a given View class (provided in constructor). It should not be made available to just anyone.

Author:
Scott Lewis
Source Code:
DirectViewAccessFacet.java

myView

View myView
Constructor Detail

DirectViewAccessFacet

public DirectViewAccessFacet(DObject receiver,
                             View aView) throws NullFacetException
Normal constructor. Takes the owner View for this facet. Note that this facet allows the receiving code to get at the underlying View reference directly, so does not protect it at all. Use with care.
Parameters:
aView - the View that this facet provides access to
Method Detail

getView

public View getView()
Method that client code can use to get directly at that underlying View. Note that any receiver of this facet type will be able to get directly at the underlying View class instance.
Returns:
View that this facet wraps
